original_text: Amnon was very upset because he loved his sister Tamar so much. He became ill because of this. Tamar had never had sex with any man, so Amnon knew that it would be difficult to get near her. Samuel 12 Samuel 14
korean_text: 그는 처녀이므로 어찌할 수 없는 줄을 알고 암논이 그의 누이 다말때문에 울화로 말미암아 병이 되니라

sentences.original_text: because he loved his sister Tamar so much
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 누이 다말을 너무 사랑했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: He became ill because of this
Tamar had never had sex with any man
sentences.korean_translation: 다말은 어떤 남자와도 성관계를 가져 본 적이 없었다

sentences.original_text: that it would be difficult to get near her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀에게 가까이 다가가기 어려울 것이라는 것을
